current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Energy Employees Occupational Illness
		  Compensation Program Act of 2000 to strengthen the quality control measures in
		  place for part B lung disease claims and to establish the Advisory Board on
		  Toxic Substances and Worker Health for the contractor employee compensation
		  program under subtitle E of such Act.

				in consultation with organizations with expertise on worker health issues in

				worker advocate communities.
shall designate a Chair of the Board from among its members.
